name: reaction-avatars
title: Reaction Button with Avatars
oneLiner: A reaction button showing avatars of users who reacted

apiDoc.name: ReactionButtonAvatars
apiDoc.description: A reaction button that displays avatars of users who have reacted to an event. By default, it shows only avatars from followed users when logged in (onlyFollows=true), helping reduce noise and highlight reactions from your social graph. Supports custom emojis, multiple visual variants, and configurable avatar display limits. The button is interactive and triggers reactions when clicked.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (optional if available in context)

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum number of avatars to display

props.name: avatarSize
props.description: Size of each avatar in pixels

props.name: showCount
props.description: Whether to show total reaction count

props.name: countMode
props.description: Whether to show total count of all reactions or just count for the specific emoji

props.name: onlyFollows
props.description: When true and user is logged in, only displays avatars from users the current user follows
